name: Cult of the Dragon
description: Conduct profane rituals to create dracoliches and expedite the apocalypse

name: Emerald Enclave
description: Druids and survivalists maintaining balance between nature and civilization

name: Harpers
description: Skalds, sleuths, and spies aspiring to make Faerûn peaceful

name: Lords' Alliance
description: Cities banded together to ensure prosperity

name: Order of the Gauntlet
description: Zealous warriors who smite evil in all its forms

name: Purple Dragon Knights
description: Cormyr's elite warriors bonded with amethyst dragons

name: Red Wizards
description: Masters of arcane magic questing for ancient artifacts

name: Zhentarim
description: Mercenaries where greed and pride are virtues

name: Fire Knives
description: Noble-born assassins, extortionists, and spies from Westgate

name: Nine Golden Swords
description: Crime syndicate based in Thesk controlling the Golden Way

name: Shadow Thieves
description: Largest thieves' guild in Faerûn based in Amn

name: Xanathar Guild
description: Criminal organization in Waterdeep led by a beholder

name: Arcane Brotherhood
description: Cabal of powerful wizards in the Hosttower of the Arcane

name: Aurora's Emporium
description: Merchant enterprise selling unusual and luxury goods

name: Elemental Cults
description: Doomsayers worshiping Elemental Evil in four forms

name: Flaming Fist
description: Mercenary company and peacekeeping force of Baldur's Gate

name: Kraken Society
description: Servants of Slarkrethel trafficking information along the Sword Coast

name: Order of Delvers
description: Explorers' guild dedicated to mapping Faerûn's depths

name: Spellguard
description: Militaristic mages protecting Silverymoon

name: Waterclock Guild
description: Artificers and artisans crafting Neverwinter's waterclocks
